tool_description: Identifies opportunities to add quantifiable metrics and achievements to resume content, making accomplishments more concrete and impactful.

achievement_text.description: Achievement or accomplishment descriptions to quantify

role_context.description: Job role context for appropriate metrics

error_messages: Empty achievement text: Provide achievement descriptions to enhance with quantification.
Insufficient content: Achievement text lacks enough detail for quantification suggestions.
Content already highly quantified: The provided text already contains substantial quantitative information.
usage: Provide achievement descriptions and optionally specify role context. The tool suggests ways to add metrics and quantifiable elements.

enhanced_achievements.description: Achievement text enhanced with quantification opportunities

quantification_opportunities.description: Specific areas where numbers could be added

metric_suggestions.description: Types of metrics that would strengthen the content

current_metrics.description: Quantitative elements already present in the text

impact_potential.description: Potential impact improvement: low, moderate, high, very_high
